translations.translation: They will roast in it on the Day of Judgment
They will burn in it on the Day of Judgement,
They shall enter it on the Day of Recompense
which they will enter on the Day of Judgment
They will enter it on the Day of Justice.
Therein they will enter, and taste its burning flame on the Day of Recompense,
They shall enter it on the day of judgment.
roasting therein on the Day of Doom,
They will burn therein on the Day of Judgment,
which they shall enter on the Day of Judgement,
Roasted they shall be therein on the Day of Requital.
entering it on the Day of Retribution,
Which they will enter on the Day of Judgment,
In which they will enter, and taste its burning flame on the Day of Recompense,
roasting in it on the Day of Recompense
They will enter it on the Day of Justice.
They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,
[82:15] entering it, to suffer its heat, on the Day of Judgement, [the Day of] Requital,
They will burn therein) they will enter the Fire (on the Day of Judgement) on the Day of Reckoning and Judgement between created beings,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { يَصْلَوْنَهَا } ويدخلون فيها { يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ } [الانفطار: 15] والجزاء بعدما حوسبوا
